content.prompt: The choice of iconography of the work shown was strongly influenced by the

choices.label: introduction of Christianity as the new Roman state religion
recent ransacking of the city of Rome by a conquering army
establishment of the Roman Empire under Augustus
connection of Rome to foreign cultures through the silk road

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how and/or why context influences artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, and/or function in the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
